title: Wand

properties.name: description
properties.value: Wands are Magic weapons that have the ability to autocast spells. Unlike most other Magic weapons, they have no Melee bonuses. They also do not provide an unlimited source of any type of runes (with the exception of the Kodai wand). Wands give higher Magic bonuses than other Magic weapons, but are significantly more difficult or expensive to obtain.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Wand
Wand
Primary typeCrush
Secondary typeMagic
Attack speed

Wands are Magic weapons that have the ability to autocast spells. Unlike most other Magic weapons, they have no Melee bonuses. They also do not provide an unlimited source of any type of runes (with the exception of the Kodai wand). Wands give higher Magic bonuses than other Magic weapons, but are significantly more difficult or expensive to obtain.

Standard wands are rewards from the Mage Training Arena minigame. Each wand can be obtained from the Rewards Guardian in exchange for pizazz points and requires a different Magic level to wield.

Two wands, the master wand and the kodai wand, have the rare ability to autocast Ancient Magicks.

  • Wand (What Lies Below)
